author: Jenni Fink
title: These Are the States Where Wearing a Mask Is Now Required in Public
description: Everyone in the U.S. is advised to cover their mouths and noses when in public to help slow the spread of the virus, but in at least four states, it's no longer optional.
content:
For millions of Americans, wearing a face mask or cloth covering when leaving their home is voluntary but for residents in four statesMaryland, New York, New Jersey and Pennsylvaniait's no longer optional.
